title: Dar and the Spear-Thrower
description: A young boy living 15,000 years ago in southeastern France is initiated into manhood by his clan and sets off on a journey to trade his valuable fire rocks for an ivory spear thrower. "A fast-paced, truly interesting coming-of-age novel based on a little-known but fascinating period of history." -- Booklist
author: Marjorie Cowley
